channel.title: Web on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Web on PacoChan's Website

item.title: New comments system
item.description: After renovating the site a few months ago I mentioned that I wasn’t sure how to implement the comments system, since the site is now totally static. After a lot of research and trying different solutions, I ended up using a selfhosted comments system called Remark42.

item.title: A decade later... new website... again
item.description: There was a time when I used to express myself more often on the internet, and I’ve had multiple websites throughout the years where I posted the projects I was doing or collaborating on.

item.title: New website... again!
item.description: I don’t know if you have noticed some subtle changes to the site.

item.title: Music added
item.description: I have added songs to the Music section, which it was empty up until now.

item.title: New title for the website
item.description: It’s been some days that I’ve been thinking for a new name for the website, since I didn’t like PacoChan’s Software.

item.title: ¡New website!
item.description: You might have not noticed, but I’ve done some subtle changes to the website.

item.title: Opening of PacoChan's Software
item.description: It’s been some time since I thought of having a website to be able to publish all the things I do and… here it is.
